repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a commentary on the text Nidānasūtra which describes metres and Vedic Stomas. Some List is written on the folio in four columns. Column 1 line 1 catvāriṃ śadkṣarā 2 paṅktiḥ? It seems that this is a list of names of Candas. Last cover folio has something carved but handwriting is not clear. Folio broken in the both corners. 49 and VIII numbers written in pink chalk. Something looks like crossed out in ink pen. On the front cover three lines are written in the right margin and Number 226 in roman in pink chalk. Three lines in granth are as: line 1 śrīnivāsa line 2 yativarya line 3 deśi

msItem.title: Nidānasūtravṛtti - Tattvabodhinī
msItem.incipit: 1v 1 viti??śaṃhāratatadvaśamācāryañca patañjaliṃ nata nidānasūtrasya vṛttuṃ kurve yathāmatiṃ sūtramatigambhīraṃ naika? 1v 2 ta ābhyāsasāhasāt tat prasādaḥ kurute vṛttiṃ tattvasubodhinīṃ . athātachandasāṃ vicayaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti .. atha
msItem.explicit: 18v 4 ti hā lokyamānyāṃ śrīyaṃ manute iti dviruktiḥ paṭalasamāptyarthaḥ
msItem.finalRubric: 18v 4 iti nidānavṛtyau dvitīyapaṭalaḥ hariḥ oṃ śrīmate sāranāthāyanamaḥ 18v 5 hariḥ oṃ .

support.p: Thin palm leaf as cover folio.

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 3 blank folio and 18 written folio

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left margin.
supportDesc.condition: Some folios have broken edges and angles, as well as wormholes and stain patches.

handNote.desc: Unclear handwriting. Clusters are so muddled that it's challenging to read.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin on 1v.

encodingDesc.p: Space is added to separate words.

TEI.text:
1v 1 śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ . viti??śaṃhāratatadvaśamācāryañca patañjaliṃ nata nidānasūtrasya vṛttuṃ kurve yathāmatiṃ sūtramatigambhīraṃ naika? 1v 2 ta ābhyāsasāhasāt tat prasādaḥ kurute vṛttiṃ tattvasubodhinīṃ . athātachandasāṃ vicayaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti .. atha
18v 4 ti hā lokyamānyāṃ śrīyaṃ manute iti dviruktiḥ paṭalasamāptyarthaḥ iti nidānavṛtyau dvitīyapaṭalaḥ hariḥ oṃ śrīmate sāranāthāyanamaḥ 18v 5 hariḥ oṃ .
